message_1: Using Rail fence cipher, encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" with a rail height of 3. How many letters are in the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using the Rail Fence Cipher with a rail height of 3, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters in each row from left to right to get the encrypted message: "HORELWLDLO"

The encrypted message has 10 letters.
